content: 9 inches x height 9 ½ inches i love this cotton = width 8 ½ inches x height 9 ¼ inches instructions for dishcloth color one mc color two cc using mc cast on 49 stiches foundation row 1 knit all stiches foundation row 2 knit all stitches pattern body row 1 using cc - sl1 k3 sl1 k7 sl1 k3 three times sl1 row 2 using cc - sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k7 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k3 two times wyif sll k7 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 in other words you are knitting the same stiches that you did in the previous row and slipping the same stiches that you slipped only this time the yarn needs to be in front before you slip the st/s all subsequent odd row you will be changing colors and all even row you will be bringing the yarn forward before you slip_stitch/s although i have not stated this you must obviously put your yarn in back again once you have slipped a st/s so that you can knit the next st/s as you get going i think you will find you do not need to read the even number row as you change colors every other row you can just carry your yarn up there is no need to cut it row 3 using mc - k1 sl1 k3 * sl1 k1 3 times sl1 k3 sl1 k1 sl1 k3* repeat from * to * sl1 k1 3 times sl1 k3 sl1 k1 row 4 using mc - k1 wyif sl 1 k3 * wyif sl1 k1 3 times wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k3* repeat from * to * wyif sl1 k1 3 times wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k1 row 5 using cc - sl1 k1 sl1 k5 sl1 k5 sl1 k3 sl1 two times k5 sl1 k5 sl1 k1 sl1 row 6 using cc - sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k5 wyif sl1 k5 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 two times k5 wyif sl1 k5 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 row 7 using mc - k3 sl1 k1 sl1 k5 five times sl1 k1 sl1 k3 row 8 using mc - k3 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k5 five times wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k3 row 9 using cc - sl1 k5 sl1 k3 sl1 k5 sl1 three times row 10 using cc - sl1 k5 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k5 wyif sl1 three times row 11 using mc - k1 sl1 k1 sl1 k3 sl1 k1 sl1 k3 sl1 k1 sl1 k1 twice sl1 k1 sl1 k3 sl1 k1 sl1 k3 sl1 k1 sl1 k1 row 12 using mc - k1 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k1 twice wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k3 wyif sl1 k1 wyif sl1 k1 row 13 using cc - sl1 k3 sl1 k3 sl1 k3 sl1 k7 twice
